body_html:
On Mac sendfile is not defined in <sys/sendfile.h>. Though it looks like there is a Darwin version of sendfile:
https://developer.apple.com/legacy/library/documentation/Darwin/Reference/ManPages/man2/sendfile.2.html

Will take a look and update the PR.
body_text:
On Mac sendfile is not defined in <sys/sendfile.h>. Though it looks like there is a Darwin version of sendfile:
https://developer.apple.com/legacy/library/documentation/Darwin/Reference/ManPages/man2/sendfile.2.html
Will take a look and update the PR.
body:
On Mac sendfile is not defined in `<sys/sendfile.h>`. Though it looks like there is a Darwin version of `sendfile`:
https://developer.apple.com/legacy/library/documentation/Darwin/Reference/ManPages/man2/sendfile.2.html

Will take a look and update the PR.
